Each day brings new challenges and rewards. Dogs have specific preferences, can get infectious diseases, and can have negative traits. But you can also have fundraisers, get random donations, and help someone find their new best friend. Unfortunately, there's never enough room, and always more dogs.

entry.title: Amazon Prime (Game) - Super Meat Boy Forever

ul.p: About the game (Super Meat Boy Forever*):

ul.li: Ratings: Metacritic 70% / Steam 56% (6/10, 1127 recommendations) / IGDB Meta 70% (12 sources) / IGDB User 78% (13 sources)

Description: Meat Boy and Bandage Girl have grown as a couple since 2010. It seems like only yesterday the two love birds were escaping from an exploding laboratory in the sky. Now itâ€™s the current year, and theyâ€™ve welcomed their daughter Nugget into the world. Their peaceful days enjoying life as a family came to an abrupt end when Dr. Fetus beat the snot out of them with a rusty shovel, and kidnapped Nugget! Now itâ€™s up to Meat Boy and Bandage Girl to rescue their daughter from a lunatic fetus in a jar that can only be described as an incel version of Tony Stark. - Super Meat Boy Forever is the sequel to Super Meat Boy! This is a new experience that eclipses the original. Donâ€™t stare directly at it unless you still have your eclipse glasses. - 7200 individually handcrafted levels combine dynamically to give you a new challenge every single time you play. Seven thousand two hundred levels. They said we couldnâ€™t do it, but we did. Whoâ€™s they? Donâ€™t ask. They donâ€™t like it when you ask. - Itâ€™s hard, but fair. Nothing in life worth having comes easy. Just ask Dark Soulman. - Meat Boy and Bandage Girl can fight back. Itâ€™s time to unleash the raw fury of parenthood on their foes just like Liam Neeson in that documentary about his family vacation in Paris. - Bigger boss battles than before. Your mind will be blown. Your socks will be blown off. Team Meat is not liable for any of this. - Brand new art with stunning detail and resolution. There are a lot of pixels in here. Grab the biggest display you have and watch those dots change color rapidly with gumption. Donâ€™t sit too close though. (If your parents arenâ€™t home you can sit as close as you want we wonâ€™t tell, but Team Meat is still not liable for any of this.) - A soundtrack composed by Ridiculon so intense that the state of Wyoming has issued a ban on all audio devices capable of playing it out of fear that just a single note will cause the dormant super volcano beneath Yellowstone to erupt ushering in a new age of darkness. - Frame by frame artisan crafted in game animations, and animated cutscenes that will make you experience procedurally generated emotions. - A story so rich and moving that it makes Citizen Kane look like an unboxing video for a dehumidifier.

ul.p: * Any information about the offer is automatically grabbed and may in rare cases not match the correct game.

div.p: Claim it now for free on Amazon Prime.

p.small: Source: Amazon Prime, Seen first: 2025-01-30 18:52:41, Generated by LootScraper

entry.title: Amazon Prime (Game) - El Hijo: A Wild West Tale

ul.p: About the game (El Hijo: A Wild West Tale*):

ul.li: Ratings: Metacritic 76% / Steam 72% (7/10, 86 recommendations) / IGDB Meta 76% (4 sources)

Description: El Hijo is a spaghetti western, indie stealth game. The game is set in a mythical place of the 19th century that very much resembles the American west, as we know it from Sergio Leoneâ€˜s westerns, taking some of its most popular characteristics of outlaw gangs, saloons, cunning, sarcasm, irony, etc. There is no indication of a specific time, or place. It could be everywhere and anywhere. You guide 6-year old boy El Hijo on his quest to find his father, by escaping a monastery, fighting his way through the desert and avoiding monstrous creatures, and outsmarting horrible gangsters in the saloon of a villain town.
